channel.title: CVE Feed for Oculus -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oculus -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-3562|2024-08-04T19:12:09.679Z -- oculus -- oculus%20browser
item.description: A remote web page could inject arbitrary HTML code into the Oculus Browser UI, allowing an attacker to spoof UI and potentially execute code. This affects the Oculus Browser starting from version 5.2.7 until 5.7.11.
